properties.name: app.services.friends.url
properties.description: Connection string for accessing some microservice.

properties.name: app.services.friends.api-key
properties.description: Api key to authorize on friends microservice.

properties.name: app.security.integrations.api-key
properties.description: Api key for authorizing external clients.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Symmetric secret key to for signing JWTs.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.key-pair.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key of asymmetric pair for signing JWTs.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.key-pair.public-key
properties.description: Public key of asymmetric pair for validating JWTs.
